response:
The image contains the following objects:

1. A blue circular object (ball) located at the bottom center.
2. A green circular object (ball) located at the top center.
3. Two black lines forming an angle on the left side.
4. Two black lines forming an angle on the right side.

Here is the position of these objects in JSON format:

```json

    {"bbox_2d": [105, 216, 167, 280], "label": "blue object"},
    {"bbox_2d": [105, 216, 167, 280], "label": "green ball"},
    {"bbox_2d": [105, 216, 167, 280], "label": "black platform"},
    {"bbox_2d": [105, 216, 167, 280], "label": "purple wall"}
]
```

Note: The coordinates for the objects are not provided as the image does not have a defined coordinate system. The labels are based on the visual description of the image.<|im_end|>
